<#C04AY1H2204|cms-react>

Hi all!!
I've developed a React CMS module and deployed it via crm developer project. Now i need to embed it on a template to be loaded as default. how can i do this ? i can't find the path to the module...

Anyone else got this problem ?

Is there any way to find out which website pages are using a specific custom module? I want to make some changes to the module, but need to verify it doesnâ€™t cause any problems in existing production pages.
left click on the module -> show dependents

Exactly what I was missing :facepalm:.
Thank you <@UV23JHEJY>!
